name: Bingo!! Dungeon!!
description:
A mix of Bingo, Chess, & Turn-Based games. You control Granny, a lady whose game of Bingo has been interrupted by the arrival of board game fans in the otherwise calm bingo hall. Join Granny in her nightmare, where the rules of all three games combine!

Thank you for trying our game, we appreciate any feedback for the post-jam build!

KNOWN MAJOR BUGS
These will all be fixed in a post-jam build, to be available as soon as the jam is over.

  • Taking a piece will not expend all of Granny's energy.
    • This makes the game unbalanced. If you'd like, press 'Skip Turn' after taking a Piece if you'd like to go by the honour system :)
  • Due to an oversight during level creation, many of our levels have AI which will not immediately attack the player if they are within line of sight.
    • AI will work correctly on: Level 2, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 12
    • AI will not work correctly on: Level 1, 3, 4, 5, 11
  • Finishing Level 12 will crash the game.
  • The music will not return after pausing the game. Avoid pausing if you'd like to enjoy the music.

THE STORY

A gentle soul, Granny enjoys a good game of Bingo every now and then.

But when the D&D and Chess Clubs rock up to disrupt her calm party, Granny descends into a nightmare! A world that combines the rules of chess, bingo, and turn-based tabletop gaming!

HOW TO PLAY

Granny has limited movement each turn. To move, left click to a desired destination.

Moving on top of a Chess Piece will make them perish in one hit, but you're equally fragile, so be careful while taking out enemy Pieces!

There are two ways of winning:

  • Destroy all your foes!
  • Form a Bingo! (Right Click tokens to move them, and line up 5 in a row)
